survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Electric Vehicle Charging Stations
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric vehicle charging stations to understand their satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and improve service quality.

questions.question_text: How often do you use electric vehicle charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover a broad range of usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use electric vehicle charging stations?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when selecting a charging station? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Ensure the options cover key decision-making factors.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you when selecting a charging station? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the availability of charging stations in your area? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for single-choice selection. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the availability of charging stations in your area? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric vehicle charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to allow detailed responses. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric vehicle charging stations?

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced any technical issues while using a charging station?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Follow up with Q6 if 'Yes' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Add routing to Q6 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Have you ever experienced any technical issues while using a charging station?

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issue you encountered.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field for detailed descriptions. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: text area (OPEN_TEXT). Only show if Q5 is 'Yes'.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical issue you encountered.
